title: CSET Multiple Subjects - Complete Course
description: Comprehensive preparation course for the California Subject Examinations for Teachers (CSET) Multiple Subjects exam. Master all three subtests with in-depth lessons, practice activities, and quizzes.

instructor.name: Dr. Jennifer Martinez
instructor.title: Former California Elementary School Principal
instructor.bio: Dr. Martinez has over 20 years of experience in California education and has helped 500+ teachers pass their CSET exams.

modules.title: Reading, Language & Literature
modules.description: Master reading comprehension strategies, language development, and literature analysis for elementary education.

modules.title: History & Social Science
modules.description: Comprehensive coverage of world history, U.S. history, geography, economics, and political science.

modules.title: Science & Scientific Inquiry
modules.description: In-depth exploration of physical science, life science, earth science, and scientific methods.

modules.title: Mathematics
modules.description: Complete mathematics review covering number sense, algebra, geometry, statistics, and probability.

modules.title: Physical Education, Human Development & Arts
modules.description: Covers PE, child development, visual arts, performing arts, and health education.

features: Downloadable study guides and cheat sheets
learningOutcomes: Demonstrate mastery of elementary-level reading and language arts instruction
Apply knowledge of history, geography, and social sciences in educational contexts
Understand and teach scientific concepts and inquiry methods
Solve and teach mathematical problems across all elementary topics
Integrate physical education, arts, and human development into curriculum
